QA-101.title: User login with multi-factor authentication
QA-101.description: As a registered user I want to log in with MFA so that my account stays secure. Includes setup, login, and recovery flows.

QA-205.title: Shopping cart price recalculation
QA-205.description: Ensure the cart recalculates totals when quantities or promotion codes change, covering edge cases like expired coupons and mixed tax categories.

QA-310.title: Project timeline dashboard
QA-310.description: Dashboard summarizes milestone progress, delivery risk indicators, and blocker alerts for program managers.
